articles.title: 11 nutritious vegetarian sources of vitamin B12 - Recipes
articles.description: Vitamin B12 also known as cobalamin is a water-soluble vitamin involved in metabolism that has many health benefits.
articles.content: It is a type of freshwater alga, which is packed with vitamin B12, proteins, minerals, and dietary fibre. It is helpful in boosting immunity, promotes weight loss, and helps fight cancer too.
